attributes.additional_details: There are too many people suffering from others monstrous actions and there needs to be change and justice to be given.
attributes.background:
Personally I feel that those who have committed horrific crimes and those who have admitted to their actions need to be punished accordingly. 
Placing someone in prison with bed and breakfast is not punishment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Abolish whole life orders and reintroduce the death penalty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700357
